movies.title: A New Hope
movies.description: The Rebel Alliance must fight to restore freedom to the galaxy, while Luke Skywalker embarks on a journey to become a Jedi.

movies.title: The Empire Strikes Back
movies.description: The Galactic Empire pursues the remnants of the Rebel Alliance, and Luke Skywalker endeavors to learn the ways of the Force.

movies.title: Return of the Jedi
movies.description: The Rebels mount a massive attack on the Empire, while Luke confronts Darth Vader.

news.title: Star Wars: Vision Volume 3
news.description: Star Wars: Vision Volume 3 is set to return in 2025, shedding light on new stories.

news.title: Star Wars Celebration Japan 2025
news.description: The new badge art for Star Wars Celebration Japan is officially updated.

news.title: Behind the Scenes of Skeleton Crew
news.description: An inside look at the creature effects of Star Wars: Skeleton Crew.
